channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m tired of corporate America’: My wife and I have $1.65 million. I’m 61. Can I retire already?
item.description: “My annual income is $108,000.”

item.title: The end of perimeter defense: When your own AI tools become the threat actor
item.description: Russia's APT28 tested LLM-powered malware on Ukraine. The same tech that breaches enterprises is now selling for $250/month on the dark web.

item.title: I’m a senior who barely survives on $1,300 a month. No way could I live on $1,000.
item.description: “We seniors are pressured and scammed into buying a lot of things we don’t need.”

item.title: The biggest winners of the Taylor Swift-Travis Kelce podcast
item.description: After years of speculation, Taylor Swift will finally appear on Travis and Jason Kelce’s podcast “New Heights,” in an episode that is scheduled to be ...

item.title: A recent college grad asks: How do I compete with AI to get a job in finance?
item.description: For finance majors specifically, many of the tasks associated with entry-level jobs are being automated. But if you start seeing AI as a tool instead ...

item.title: OpenAI brings GPT-4o back as a default for all paying ChatGPT users, Altman promises ‘plenty of notice’ if it leaves again
item.description: For now, the changes should help placate users who felt frustrated by the sudden shift to GPT-5 and deprecation of OpenAI's older LLMs.

item.title: Stock market rally on hot CPI print is indicative of market strength, declares strategist Tom Lee
item.description: Tom Lee says it’s a sign of how robust the stock market is right now that gains came on a hotter-than-forecast core CPI report.

item.title: OpenAI adds new ChatGPT third-party tool connectors to Dropbox, MS Teams as Altman clarifies GPT-5 prioritization
item.description: OpenAI is positioning GPT-5 not only as a more powerful AI model but also as part of a more connected workspace.

item.title: Liquid AI wants to give smartphones small, fast AI that can see with new LFM2-VL model
item.description: Liquid AI has described this license as based on Apache 2.0 principles, but the full text has not yet been published.

item.title: HistoSonics reaches $2.25B valuation after investor-led majority acquisition
item.description: To date, HistoSonics said its Edison system has treated more than 2,000 patients at over 50 leading U.S. medical centers. The post HistoSonics reaches...

item.title: Simbe makes Tally more effective in fresh departments with latest update
item.description: Fresh departments now account for 42% of total grocery sales and 41% of online grocery revenue, Simbe said. The post Simbe makes Tally more effective ...
